languages.text: {n}Сморгнув накатившую слезу, кардинал продолжает:{/n} "Более всего ужасно то, что братья мои, предстоятели церквей Простора Коронус, узрели во мне святого. Они оказались столь упорны в своих заблуждениях, что направили на святую Терру прошение о причислении меня к лику святых. После этого я утвердился в решении предать себя пыткам на глазах прихожан, чтобы они вспомнили, что нет в мире святости, кроме дарованной Богом-Императором. Даже люди моего сана могут и должны каяться и становиться чище день ото дня. Прошу, позвольте мне принять мучения во имя Его на глазах у прихожан!"
languages.translation_comment: После куя кадр на левую сторору весов. На чашу кладут книгу.
После куя кадр на левую сторору весов. На чашу кладут книгу.

languages.text: {n}The cardinal blinks away a tear and continues:{/n} "But most terrible of all is that my brethren, the preachers of the Koronus Expanse, see me as a holy man. Their delusion has been so persistent that they sent a petition to Holy Terra, asking that I be made a saint. That was when I became firm in my decision to submit to torture in front of my congregation, thus reminding them that no holiness exists unless bestowed as a gift by the God-Emperor. Even clerics of my rank can and must repent, thus becoming more pure every day. Please, allow me to undergo mortal torture in His name in front of my parishioners!"
languages.original_text: {n}Сморгнув накатившую слезу, кардинал продолжает:{/n} "Более всего ужасно то, что братья мои, предстоятели церквей Простора Коронус, узрели во мне святого. Они оказались столь упорны в своих заблуждениях, что направили на святую Терру прошение о причислении меня к лику святых. После этого я утвердился в решении предать себя пыткам на глазах прихожан, чтобы они вспомнили, что нет в мире святости, кроме дарованной Богом-Императором. Даже люди моего сана могут и должны каяться и становиться чище день ото дня. Прошу, позвольте мне принять мучения во имя Его на глазах у прихожан!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Cardinal blinks away a tear and continues,{/n} "And most terrible of all is that my brethren, the church leaders of the Koronus Expanse, see me as a holy man. Their delusion has been so persistent that they sent a petition to Holy Terra, asking that I be made a saint. That was when I became firm in my decision to submit to torture in front of my congregation, thus reminding them that no holiness exists in the world unless bestowed as a gift by the God-Emperor. Even clerics of my rank can and must repent, becoming purer every day. Please allow me to undergo torture in His name in front of my congregation!"

languages.text: {n}Der Kardinal zwinkert eine Träne weg und fährt schließlich fort.{/n} "Aber das Schlimmste von allem ist, dass mich meine Brüder, die Prediger der Koronus-Ausdehnung, als heiligen Mann betrachten. Ihr Wahn ging sogar so weit, dass sie eine Petition zum heiligen Terra schickten, in der sie um meine Heiligsprechung baten. Damals reifte in mir der Entschluss, mich vor meiner Kongregation der Folter zu unterwerfen, um sie daran zu erinnern, dass es Heiligkeit nur gibt, wenn sie vom Gottimperator gewährt wird. Selbst Kleriker meines Ranges können und müssen büßen, um von Tag zu Tag reiner zu werden. Bitte erlaubt mir, mich in Seinem Namen vor meiner Gemeinde einer tödlichen Folter zu unterziehen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The cardinal blinks away a tear and continues:{/n} "But most terrible of all is that my brethren, the preachers of the Koronus Expanse, see me as a holy man. Their delusion has been so persistent that they sent a petition to Holy Terra, asking that I be made a saint. That was when I became firm in my decision to submit to torture in front of my congregation, thus reminding them that no holiness exists unless bestowed as a gift by the God-Emperor. Even clerics of my rank can and must repent, thus becoming more pure every day. Please, allow me to undergo mortal torture in His name in front of my parishioners!"

Ihr Wahn ging sogar so weit, dass sie eine Petition zum heiligen Terra schickten, in der sie um meine Heiligsprechung baten. Damals reifte in mir der Entschluss, mich vor meiner Kongregation der Folter zu unterwerfen, um sie daran zu erinnern, dass es Heiligkeit nur gibt, wenn sie vom Gottimperator gewährt wird. Selbst Kleriker meines Ranges können und müssen büßen, um von Tag zu Tag reiner zu werden. Bitte erlaubt mir, mich in Seinem Namen vor meiner Gemeinde einer tödlichen Folter zu unterziehen!"

languages.text: {n}Une larme roule sur la joue du cardinal lorsqu'il cligne des yeux, puis il continue :{/n} « Mais le plus terrible, c'est que mes confrères, les prédicateurs des Étendues de Koronus, me considèrent comme un saint homme. Ils se bercent d'illusions au point d'avoir envoyé une pétition à la Sainte Terra demandant à ce que je sois canonisé. C'est ce qui m'a poussé à prendre la ferme décision de me soumettre à la torture devant ma congrégation, afin de lui rappeler que la sainteté ne peut exister à moins d'avoir été conférée par l'Empereur-Dieu. Même les religieux de mon rang peuvent et doivent se repentir, pour gagner chaque jour en pureté. Je vous en supplie, permettez-moi de subir une torture mortelle en Son nom devant mes paroissiens ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The cardinal blinks away a tear and continues:{/n} "But most terrible of all is that my brethren, the preachers of the Koronus Expanse, see me as a holy man. Their delusion has been so persistent that they sent a petition to Holy Terra, asking that I be made a saint. That was when I became firm in my decision to submit to torture in front of my congregation, thus reminding them that no holiness exists unless bestowed as a gift by the God-Emperor. Even clerics of my rank can and must repent, thus becoming more pure every day. Please, allow me to undergo mortal torture in His name in front of my parishioners!"

Ils se bercent d'illusions au point d'avoir envoyé une pétition à la Sainte Terra demandant à ce que je sois canonisé. C'est ce qui m'a poussé à prendre la ferme décision de me soumettre à la torture devant ma congrégation, afin de lui rappeler que la sainteté ne peut exister à moins d'avoir été conférée par l'Empereur-Dieu. Même les religieux de mon rang peuvent et doivent se repentir, pour gagner chaque jour en pureté. Je vous en supplie, permettez-moi de subir une torture mortelle en Son nom devant mes paroissiens ! »

{n}Une larme roule sur la joue du cardinal lorsqu'il cligne des yeux, puis il continue :{/n} « Mais le plus terrible, c'est que mes confrères, les ecclésiastiques des Étendues de Koronus, me considèrent comme un saint homme. Ils se bercent d'illusions au point d'avoir envoyé une pétition à la Sainte Terra demandant à ce que je sois canonisé. C'est ce qui m'a poussé à prendre la ferme décision de me soumettre à la torture devant ma congrégation, afin de lui rappeler que la sainteté ne peut exister à moins d'avoir été conférée par l'Empereur-Dieu. Même les religieux de mon rang peuvent et doivent se repentir, pour gagner chaque jour en pureté. Je vous en supplie, permettez-moi de subir une torture mortelle en Son nom devant mes paroissiens ! »

languages.text: {n}红衣主教眼中噙着泪水，继续开了口。{/n}“但最可怕的是，我的同袍们，科罗努斯扩区国教教会其他的布道士，他们坚信我是圣洁的化身。他们的妄想极其顽固，甚至向神圣泰拉请愿，要求将我册封为圣人。正是那个时候，我坚定了决心，我要求在所有信徒面前公开接受折磨。只有这样，才能提醒所有人——除非是神皇亲自赐予的祝福，否则凡人无法实现真正的圣洁。即便是我这种级别的神职人员也必须进行忏悔，只有这样，才能朝着圣洁的终点不断前进。请允许我在所有教众面前，以神皇的名义，接受至死方休的惩戒吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}The cardinal blinks away a tear and continues:{/n} "But most terrible of all is that my brethren, the preachers of the Koronus Expanse, see me as a holy man. Their delusion has been so persistent that they sent a petition to Holy Terra, asking that I be made a saint. That was when I became firm in my decision to submit to torture in front of my congregation, thus reminding them that no holiness exists unless bestowed as a gift by the God-Emperor. Even clerics of my rank can and must repent, thus becoming more pure every day. Please, allow me to undergo mortal torture in His name in front of my parishioners!"

{n}红衣主教眼中噙着泪水，继续开了口。{/n}“但最可怕的是，我的同袍们，科罗努斯扩区国教教会的其他成员，他们坚信我是圣洁的化身。他们的妄想极其顽固，甚至向神圣泰拉请愿，要求将我册封为圣人。正是那个时候，我坚定了决心，我要求在所有信徒面前公开接受折磨。只有这样，才能提醒所有人——除非是神皇亲自赐予的祝福，否则凡人无法实现真正的圣洁。即便是我这种级别的神职人员也必须进行忏悔，只有这样，才能朝着圣洁的终点不断前进。请允许我在所有教众面前，以神皇的名义，接受至死方休的惩戒吧！”

languages.text: {n}El cardenal se seca una lágrima y sigue:{/n} «Lo peor de todo es que mis hermanos, los otros predicadores de la Extensión de Koronus me consideran un hombre santo. Es tan persistente su delirio que enviaron una petición a la Sagrada Terra, pidiendo que se me nombrara santo. Entonces decidí someterme a la tortura ante mi congregación, para recordarles que toda santidad proviene del Dios Emperador. Hasta los clérigos de mi rango pueden y deben arrepentirse, volviéndose más puros cada día. Por favor, ¡permita que sufra tortura mortal en Su nombre ante mis feligreses!».
languages.original_text: {n}The cardinal blinks away a tear and continues:{/n} "But most terrible of all is that my brethren, the preachers of the Koronus Expanse, see me as a holy man. Their delusion has been so persistent that they sent a petition to Holy Terra, asking that I be made a saint. That was when I became firm in my decision to submit to torture in front of my congregation, thus reminding them that no holiness exists unless bestowed as a gift by the God-Emperor. Even clerics of my rank can and must repent, thus becoming more pure every day. Please, allow me to undergo mortal torture in His name in front of my parishioners!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El cardenal se seca una lágrima y sigue:{/n} «Lo peor de todo es que mis hermanos, los otros predicadores de la Extensión de Koronus me consideran un hombre santo. Es tan persistente su delirio que enviaron una petición a la Sagrada Terra, pidiendo que se me nombrara santo. Entonces decidí someterme a la tortura ante mi congregación, para recordarles que toda santidad proviene del Dios Emperador. Hasta los clérigos de mi rango pueden y deben arrepentirse, volviéndose más puros cada día. Por favor, ¡permita que sufra tortura mortal en Su nombre ante mis feligreses!».

languages.text: {n}枢機卿は涙を一筋ぬぐい、語り続けた。{/n}「しかし、最も恐ろしいのは、我が兄弟たるコロヌス・エクスパンスの上位聖職者たちが、私を聖なる者として見ていることです。彼らの妄信はあまりに根深く、ついには聖なる地球に嘆願書を送り、私を聖人に列せよと求めました。そのとき私は、信徒たちの前で拷問を受けるという決意を固めました。それによって神帝陛下からの賜物でない限り、聖性など存在しないことを彼らに思い知らせたいのです。私のような地位の聖職者であっても、悔い改めることはできますし、そうしなければなりません。そうすることで、毎日少しでも純粋になることができるのです。どうか、私の信徒の前で、陛下の御名において死ぬまで拷問を受けることをお許しください！」
languages.original_text: {n}The cardinal blinks away a tear and continues:{/n} "But most terrible of all is that my brethren, the preachers of the Koronus Expanse, see me as a holy man. Their delusion has been so persistent that they sent a petition to Holy Terra, asking that I be made a saint. That was when I became firm in my decision to submit to torture in front of my congregation, thus reminding them that no holiness exists unless bestowed as a gift by the God-Emperor. Even clerics of my rank can and must repent, thus becoming more pure every day. Please, allow me to undergo mortal torture in His name in front of my parishioners!"

languages.text: {n}Kardinal, gözyaşlarını silerek devam ediyor.{/n} "Ancak kardeşlerim. Yüreğimi en çok dehşete boğan şey, Koronus Enginliği'nin vaizlerinin beni kutsal bir adam olarak görmesidir. Bu vehimdeki ısrarları o kadar büyüdü ki Kutsal Terra'ya dilekçe göndererek aziz ilan edilmemi istediler. İşte o zaman cemaatimin önünde işkenceye tabi tutulma kararımda azmettim, onlara Tanrı İmparator lütuf olarak bahşedilmedikçe hiçbir kutsallığın var olamayacağını hatırlatmak istedim. Benim kadememdeki din adamları bile tövbe edebilir ve etmelidir. Ancak bu şekilde arınmaları sürebilir. Lütfen O'nun adına cemaatimin huzurunda ölümcül işkenceye uğramama müsaade gösterin!"
languages.original_text: {n}The cardinal blinks away a tear and continues:{/n} "But most terrible of all is that my brethren, the preachers of the Koronus Expanse, see me as a holy man. Their delusion has been so persistent that they sent a petition to Holy Terra, asking that I be made a saint. That was when I became firm in my decision to submit to torture in front of my congregation, thus reminding them that no holiness exists unless bestowed as a gift by the God-Emperor. Even clerics of my rank can and must repent, thus becoming more pure every day. Please, allow me to undergo mortal torture in His name in front of my parishioners!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kardinal gözyaşlarını silerek devam ediyor.{/n} "Ancak kardeşlerim. Yüreğimi en çok dehşete boğan şey, Koronus Enginliği'nin vaizlerinin beni kutsal bir adam olarak görmesidir. Bu vehimdeki ısrarları o kadar büyüdü ki Kutsal Terra'ya bir dilekçe göndererek aziz ilan edilmemi istediler. İşte o zaman cemaatimin önünde işkenceye tabi tutulma kararımda azmettim ki onlara Tanrı İmparator tarafından bir lütuf olarak bahşedilmedikçe hiçbir kutsallığın var olamayacağını hatırlatmak istedim. Benim kadememdeki din adamları bile tövbe edebilir ve etmelidir. Ancak bu şekilde arınmaları her gün sürebilir. Lütfen, O'nun adına cemaatimin huzurunda ölümcül işkenceye uğramama müsaade gösterin!"

{n}Kardinal gözyaşlarını silerek devam ediyor.{/n} "Ancak kardeşlerim. Yüreğimi en çok dehşete boğan şey, Koronus Enginliği'nin ekleşiarklarının beni kutsal bir adam olarak görmesidir. Bu vehimdeki ısrarları o kadar büyüdü ki Kutsal Terra'ya bir dilekçe göndererek aziz ilan edilmemi istediler. İşte o zaman cemaatimin önünde işkenceye tabi tutulma kararımda azmettim ki onlara Tanrı İmparator tarafından bir lütuf olarak bahşedilmedikçe hiçbir kutsallığın var olamayacağını hatırlatmak istedim. Benim kadememdeki din adamları bile tövbe edebilir ve etmelidir. Ancak bu şekilde arınmaları her gün sürebilir. Lütfen, O'nun adına cemaatimin huzurunda ölümcül işkenceye uğramama müsaade gösterin!"
